page.title: 12ECONOMICS_POCKET MONEY_
page.content: We get pocket money every week.We spend half of it,and the other half we save.Of corse we dont buy our clothes and shoes(our parents buy those) but we do buy most of our sweets,comics, stickers etc.Some people save up for jewellery,some people save up for games,some save up for presents and others save just for the sake of saving.We spend quite a lot of our money on going to the swimming baths and sports centre.We buy most of our records and tapes but only now and then.The style of music varies a lot.Most people spend their money on things that they can collect for example,rubbers,stamps,keyrings and postcards.Money is also spent on special occasions such as Birthdays,Christmas,Anniversaries, Mothers and Fathers day.At the end of the week we dont have much money left.
